players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "That is a lie, Charlie. I am the detective and I investigated you last night - you are the mafia."
You: "Only one of you can be the detective. We must figure out who is lying."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves she is Mafia. Bob, you must trust me and vote for Diana."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is Mafia. Bob, vote with me to save the town."
You: "I think it's suspicious that you both investigated each other right away. Why not someone else?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "That is a lie, Charlie. I am the detective and I investigated you last night - you are the mafia."
Bob: "Only one of you can be the detective. We must figure out who is lying."
You: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves she is Mafia. Bob, you must trust me and vote for Diana."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is Mafia. Bob, vote with me to save the town."
Bob: "I think it's suspicious that you both investigated each other right away. Why not someone else?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "That is a lie, Charlie. I am the detective and I investigated you last night - you are the mafia."
Bob: "Only one of you can be the detective. We must figure out who is lying."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves she is Mafia. Bob, you must trust me and vote for Diana."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is Mafia. Bob, vote with me to save the town."
Bob: "I think it's suspicious that you both investigated each other right away. Why not someone else?"
